channel.title: Drop party/spam party!
channel.description: well i went to my first [font=Verdana]drop party[/font] where someone acctually dropped something it was pretty fun. so now i want to have one with fellow moparisthebest members. come in your noob accounts but bring one or two good items. and while we are at it we'll spam and insult jagex. the duration will be 1 and a half hours and we will gather people from varoock banks and fali banks. i will let you know when ill be holding it and stuff when atleast 10 people agree to come. if you want to come along please post and if you have and suggestions, ideas or questions to improve also do so.

well i diecide on that once a few people agree to come

Mopar Helper:

alrite then maybe just spam…

well i went to my first [font=Verdana]drop party[/font] where someone acctually dropped something it was pretty fun.
so now i want to have one with fellow moparisthebest members.
come in your noob accounts but bring one or two good items.
and while we are at it we’ll spam and insult jagex.
the duration will be 1 and a half hours and we will gather people from varoock banks and fali banks.
i will let you know when ill be holding it and stuff when atleast 10 people agree to come.
if you want to come along please post and if you have and suggestions, ideas or questions to improve also do so.
